Text:
First time user has posted this movie in ZIP format.

Just a word of caution to down loaders.

Raleigh109 you are also a first-time user and have NO torrents uploaded. I'm just trying to give back after using this site for so long.

The zip file contains only the video files and screen shots.

Hi.  There is no reason to zip video files.  They are already in a highly compressed format as the video file so little to no space savings.

If there were screen shots we can't see those first either in a zip file.  Further not everyone wants the entire set, for example with ITC often the first video is just the girl standing around and the last is something fetishy.

Thanks anyway, but I would remove this torrent and re/up it as separate files.
